subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chris Conner scored on Pittsburgh’s first successful penalty shot in nearly four years, Jordan Staal added his third goal in three games and the Sidney Crosby-less Penguins beat the injury-thinned Detroit Red Wings on Tuesday night.
snippet: Chris Conner scored on Pittsburgh’s first successful penalty shot in nearly four years, Jordan Staal added his third goal in three games and the Sidney Crosby-less Penguins beat the injury-thinned Detroit Red Wings on Tuesday night.
